column2: WELCOME! This is RandomThunder - opensource software for random selection of vehicles
column7: Ground Realistic Battles - a mode of joint realistic battles, in which tanks, planes, helicopters fight on the same battlefield
column8: Air Realistic Battles - a mode in which players of one team fight with another on planes
column13: Enter the number of available crews or vehicle limit:
column18: ERROR! Planes cannot occupy the entire setup, at least one ground vehicle is required
